comment: /**  * Apply additional functionality to the given invoker.  * @param endpointId the endpoint ID  * @param operationType the operation type  * @param parameters the operation parameters  * @param invoker the invoker to advise  * @return an potentially new operation invoker with support for additional features  */
code: /**  * Apply additional functionality to the given invoker.  * @param endpointId the endpoint ID  * @param operationType the operation type  * @param parameters the operation parameters  * @param invoker the invoker to advise  * @return an potentially new operation invoker with support for additional features  */ OperationInvoker apply(EndpointId endpointId, OperationType operationType, OperationParameters parameters, OperationInvoker invoker).
